name: Save The Villy
description:
Save The Villy - A game about a simple forester who devoted his entire life to his work. Years passed, but he was still faithful to his work, but at one point the life of the forest was in danger. Those who came from far away strangers wanted to destroy the forest to build their cities. But Willy is not from the timid dozen and so he decided to fight back the villains. But first you need to escape from the ardent metal cars.
Waiting for you endless gameplay in the style of Bullet Hell for pleasant music, how long can you survive?
